name: Speed Run in the Castle 2
description:
Purtroppo il castello è stato invaso dai mostri, ma tu corri, corri veloce e vedtrai che riuscirai a sfuggire.

Correndo riuscirai a sbloccare molti personaggi.

Buona Fortuna!

Grazie infinite a 0x72 per i tileset!

----------------------------------

Unfortunately the castle has been invaded by monsters, but you run, run fast and you will see that you will be able to escape.

By running you will be able to unlock many characters. 

Good luck!

Many thanks to 0x72 for the tilesets!
